YukariProvide.line:04e7520: "I've been burning the midnight oil recently, there are dark circles under my eyes."
YukariProvide.line:049c1f2: [Gift] Give <h>Eye Cream From the Outside World</h>, gain <h>Border Sensor</h>.

Debut.line:06f5f1b:
"Feel free to take anything you need."
Choose one Advantage (Passing the Bamboo Forest will bring additional options).
Debut.line:0f87a81: [Swap] Lose starting Exhibit and gain a random Shining Exhibit.
Debut.line:05100b8: [Recall] From 3 random Uncommon cards, choose one to add to the library.
Debut.line:097011d: [Enlighten] Add a random Rare card to the library.
Debut.line:02cfa2c: [Trade] Lose all money, gain a random Rare Exhibit.
Debut.line:0b72af3: [Relieve] Choose a card from the library to remove.
Debut.line:067ea40: [Alter] Choose a card from the library to transform.
Debut.line:0e0ea19:
"Here's some medicine I've carefully prepared."
Take a Pill.
Debut.line:0e2540a:
"For the success of the mission, take an item to your liking."
Choose one Secret Treasure (Easy Difficulty extra bonus).

Select.line:005887b:
Who do you think might have a clue to the culprit?

Choose your opponent, she will become the boss of the first act.

Supply.line:032ca60: "Thank you for your hard work. Master told me to provide you some supplies."

RinnosukeTrade.line:03aa37a: "I can take possession of items which you no longer need."
RinnosukeTrade.line:0de0aae: [Invalid] You have no items to sell.
RinnosukeTrade.line:0cc8782: [Invalid] You have no items to sell.
RinnosukeTrade.line:0bb144b: "I'll give you a very helpful item in exchange for it."

DoremyPortal.line:0af435d: "If you wish to find her quickly, I have a shortcut right here."
DoremyPortal.line:0891a52: [Use Tunnel] Start boss fight immediately. Gain <h>Border Sensor</h>.
DoremyPortal.line:0f1da28: [Search for Treasure] Gain a random Exhibit and {{0}} <Money />, gain Misfortune: <h>Psychedelic</h>.

JunkoColorless.line:0632b2f: "Allow me and my powers of purification to assist you in controlling them."
JunkoColorless.line:0833aaf: Select one colored mana from the mana base and convert it into two colorless mana.

PatchouliPhilosophy.line:0b23fed:
"What a coincidence, . I can help tune your affinity with these jewels."
(A more than sufficient test subject.)
PatchouliPhilosophy.line:07acb35: Choose a colored base mana, and convert it into Philosopher's Mana.

MiyoiBartender.line:0868bad: (Geidontei... If I remember correctly, it opens to youkai during the night.)
MiyoiBartender.line:061da42: [A Swig] Gain Exhibit: <h>{{0}}</h>, and remove a card from the library.
MiyoiBartender.line:018cd9a: [Drinking Competition] Gain {{0}} <Money /> and gain two Misfortunes: <h>{{1}}</h>.
MiyoiBartender.line:0bea743: [A Sip] Fight a random group of enemies and get a random Rare Exhibit.
MiyoiBartender.line:0b0300d: "Uwah! Please take this and keep it a secret."

SumirekoGathering.line:0977eb5: "We can trade with <h>Rare</h> cards. If you don't have any, a reasonable price is also acceptable."
SumirekoGathering.line:022ef50: [Trade] Trade <h>{{0}}</h> for one of three Rare cards.
SumirekoGathering.line:0d7f696: [Invalid] You have no Rare cards to trade.
SumirekoGathering.line:07a7bdc: [Purchase] Pay {{0}} <Money /> to get one of three Rare cards.
SumirekoGathering.line:04c2389: "Can I have it for this high-end cosmetic? I got it from a raffle, but young people like me have no use for it."

ShinmyoumaruForge.line:04566b1: "We must use the Miracle Mallet to rebel against the rare cards, <Player />!"
ShinmyoumaruForge.line:009a2f1: [Shrink] Remove a <h>non-Basic</h> card from the library.
ShinmyoumaruForge.line:0bb82a2: [Transform] Choose {{0}} Basic cards to transform into Common cards, lose {{1}} maximum life.

WatatsukiPurify.line:05fe9e1: "There you are, Master Eirin's assistant. Allow me to lend you a hand."
WatatsukiPurify.line:0220408: [Recite Prayer] Lose {{0}} maximum life, gain two <h>{{1}}</h>.
WatatsukiPurify.line:015cd2b: [Consume Peach] Increase maximum life by {{0}}, gain Misfortune: <h>{{1}}</h>.

YorigamiSisters.line:0e93370: "Their original price is 100<Money />, but we're offering a special discount of <hg>{{0}}%</hg> on all first-time purchases~"
YorigamiSisters.line:03a90b9: [Refuse to Buy] Pay {{0}} <Money />, or gain Misfortune: <h>{{1}}</h>.
YorigamiSisters.line:09653e9: "Is it a good idea to punish someone as broke as her? Though it's not necessarily a bad thing."

HatateInterview.line:0f1ab7b: "Why have you decided to take part in this incident, Miss <Player />?"

HinaCollect.line:0183740: "Let me bear this misfortune for you."

KogasaSpook.line:03bbd9d: [Play Along] Gain Misfortune: <h>{{0}}</h>, choose two cards to Upgrade.

KosuzuBookstore.line:0150d96: "Welcome to Suzunaan, the book rental shop. Got any books you'd like to read?"
KosuzuBookstore.line:09d3e76:
"Alright.
You will need to pay a deposit of {{0}} . Or, you could return another book."

NarumiOfferCard.line:0a28cc1: Will worshipping her bring good fortune?
NarumiOfferCard.line:08162bb: Choose a card to offer, and gain a corresponding reward.
NarumiOfferCard.line:0e989ef: Narumi hammers her little fist on <Player />'s chest.
NarumiOfferCard.line:0d02cdc: Narumi smiles at <Player /> and heals her wounds with magic.
NarumiOfferCard.line:0f9e764: [Continue] Restore {{0}}% life, increase maximum life by {{1}}.
NarumiOfferCard.line:07aab8f: Narumi smiles at <Player />, casting magic to make herself look radiant.
NarumiOfferCard.line:0cc67e1: [Continue] Restore life to max, increase maximum life by {{0}}.

NazrinDetect.line:062ca0e: "What do you say, <Player />? Just pay a small fee and it's yours..."
NazrinDetect.line:0aa76a7: Nazrin finds some ancient coins! Gain {{0}} <Money />.
NazrinDetect.line:0bf5da1: Oh no, Nazrin triggers a cursed trap! Gain a random Misfortune card.
NazrinDetect.line:04d438a: Nazrin finds one of the exposition's lost treasures! Gain a random Exhibit.
NazrinDetect.line:0bc8048: Nazrin digs up a hot spring! Restore all life.
NazrinDetect.line:0e8e6c2: Nazrin finds a fairy's forging hammer! Upgrade a card.
NazrinDetect.line:0766cf1: Nazrin digs up some dust-covered incense! Remove a card.

KeineSales.line:0285d02: "That doesn't matter! Just sponsor the Hieda Temple School and stand a chance to win one of the 'Three Household Treasures of the Modern World!'"
KeineSales.line:07b190b: [Answer] Pay {{0}} <Money /> and choose a question to answer.
KeineSales.line:06dcb37: "We're eager to see your performance! Please answer the following question:"

MikeInvest.line:0455736: "Guaranteed returns if you invest right now, wanna learn more?"
MikeInvest.line:085816e: [Short-Term Investment] Lose {{0}} <Money />, gain a random Rare card.

YoumuDelivery.line:0577ef3: "Miss <Player />, could you do a taste-test for me before I deliver them to Yuyuko-sama?"
YoumuDelivery.line:0ea45c4: [Iced Tricolor Dango] Transform one card into an Upgraded multicolor card.
YoumuDelivery.line:0d7cfde: [Sardinia Mooncake] Gain Exhibit: <h>{{1}}</h>, and gain Misfortune: <h>{{0}}</h>.

RemiliaMeet.line:0c6dafc: "If you beg for it, I'm more than happy to lend you a hand~"
RemiliaMeet.line:0b0f1b1: [Seek Help] Replace Basic attack cards with <h>Devil's Attack</h>, gain Misfortune: <h>{{2}}</h>.
RemiliaMeet.line:0aa0a2f: [Deal] Replace Basic attack cards with <h>Devil's Attack</h>, lose <h>{{2}}</h>.

RingoEmp.line:00a9945: "Those are copies of our patent in the Lunar Capital, we hope you will help us defend our intellectual property."
RingoEmp.line:0b93b5a: [Refuse] Get three random Tool cards and gain Misfortune: <h>{{0}}</h>.

YachieOppression.line:037c786: "The otter spirits smell some of the kappa's rogue drones. For the sake of the land, please deal with the issue as soon as you can~"
YachieOppression.line:07acb62: [Fight] Fight a phalanx of drones and get a random Rare Exhibit.
YachieOppression.line:0970713: "As expected of <Player />! Please accept my carefully prepared gift!"

AssistKagerou.line:0d31645: "Miss <Player />, will this treasure I found help you resolve the incident faster?"
AssistKagerou.line:09559cc: [No Fluff] Gain a random Exhibit. Add <h>{{0}}</h> to the library.

EternityAscension.line:0e35dc4: "Come and receive the blessing of the God of Evernight, <Player />!"
EternityAscension.line:0663fce: [Grant Oblivion] Lose {{0}} life, remove a card from the library.
EternityAscension.line:0786492: [Grant Change] Lose {{0}} life, choose a card from the library to transform into an Uncommon card.

KaguyaVersusMokou.line:0bc6368: (I have no idea what they're fighting over, but if they continue to fight, the thief might use the chaos to get away.)

MystiaBbq.line:0b7dfd2: "Come on, <Player />. Have some skewers or you won't have any energy to exterminate youkai~"
MystiaBbq.line:06bc591: "Gotcha~ one grilled lamprey, that will be {{0}} <Money />."
MystiaBbq.line:0f8955e: "Gotcha~ one skewer of grilled mushrooms, that will be {{0}} <Money />."

ParseeJealousy.line:0340a4c: <Player /> sees an Exhibit floating in the water. Fish it out?
ParseeJealousy.line:028b07c: "I'll place a curse on you! You'll only find bad exhibits tonight!"

RumiaDriving.line:05e7754: <Player /> sees a dusk youkai speeding towards her.

TewiThreat.line:05ef949: <Player /> sees a large bag of money on the side of the road.
TewiThreat.line:0f3adf4:
"If you want your luck to stay, it'll cost you a tiny bit."
*Rubbing fingers*

BackgroundDancers.line:0927a10: "With your life as the price, see what power you can gain from the master's doors."
BackgroundDancers.line:024f6c3: [Utility] Lose {{0}} life, get two random Tool cards.
BackgroundDancers.line:0e4c0ab: [Exhibit] Lose {{0}} life, gain a random Exhibit.
BackgroundDancers.line:0ba21b9: [Ability] Lose {{0}} life, gain a random ability card.
BackgroundDancers.line:0b8832a: "You still want money in the end~ Wanna continue?"
BackgroundDancers.line:0579e44: "You wanna become tougher? Lacking confidence I see~"
BackgroundDancers.line:091e5ec: "Exhibits from the exposition?! Never thought that would be in the doors..."
BackgroundDancers.line:0a37d54: "Looking to obtain new abilities? Let's see how the door guides you."
